mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suggest (member_id, suggest_title, suggest_content, suggest_regdate, city_code, suggest_photo, class_time, maxCnt, price, type) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{suggest_title}, #{suggest_content}, NOW(), #{city_code}, #{suggest_photo}, #{class_time}, #{maxCnt}, #{price}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT A.member_id, A.class_code, A.class_list_current, B.class_subject, B.class_teacher, B.class_date, B.class_memlit, B.class_memcnt, B.class_price, C.city_name, B.class_regdate FROM class_list A, class B, city C WHERE A.member_id = #{member_id} AND A.class_code = B.class_code AND B.city_code = C.city_code ORDER BY B.class_regdate DESC
